About Me

Let me tell you a few things ...

BIO

I am a 4th year student currently pursuing B.tech(Bachelor of Technology) from Graphic Era Deemed to be university with Computer Science branch. My Hometown in Haryana but i study in Dehradun. I like to do coding and currently i am also learning web development. I also like new Technology like IOT, Blockchain. I like to explore new things as more as possible . I am always focusing towards my goal. I also like sports like cricket, chess, kabaddi and many more .Whenever i am free or stressed i like to listen music. I believe in understand things rather than cramming.
